description: This sculpture course introduces lost wax bronze casting, an art and industrial process that
changed the course of human civilization. Students learn to cast, finish and preset cast
metal work, building upon concepts from the foundation course and exploring the next level
of sculpture topics, issues and concern.  Te course makes use of hands-on instruction,
readings, slide talks and discussion. Lab fee. Prerequisite: Art 114 (Mandatory); Art 111,
